import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './Navbar.css' import logo from '../Assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart_icon.png' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' import dropdown_new from '../Assets/dropdown_new.png' import { useRef } from 'react' export const Navbar = () => { const [menu,setMenu] = useState("shop"); const {getTotalCartItems} = useContext(ShopContext); const menuRef = useRef(); const dropdown_toogle = (e) => { menuRef.current.classList.toggle('nav-menu-visible'); e.target.classList.toggle('open') } return (

SHOPPER

  • {setMenu("shop")}}>Shop{menu==="shop"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("mens")}}>Men{menu==="mens"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("womens")}}>Women{menu==="womens"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("kids")}}>Kids{menu==="kids"?
    :<>}
{getTotalCartItems()}
) }
